meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being unisexual.
meanings.sent1: The unisexuality of the flower made it difficult to determine its gender.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the simplicity of unisexuality in the clothing store.
meanings.sent3: The unisexuality of the situation brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, unisexuality is becoming more popular than ever.
meanings.sent5: The unisexuality of the design made it memorable and appealing to all.

meanings.definition: The state of being sexually attracted to individuals of the same sex.
meanings.sent1: His unisexuality was accepted and celebrated by his friends.
meanings.sent2: She realized her unisexuality after developing feelings for her female classmate.
meanings.sent3: The unisexuality of the movie character added an interesting twist to the plot.
meanings.sent4: In a world of diversity, unisexuality is just one aspect of human nature.
meanings.sent5: The unisexuality of their relationship was a beautiful expression of love.
